messages.messageBody:
on 8/25/04 3:14 AM, oceansummermoon at oceansummer@... wrote:

> My name is Kim. I've been lurking here since the beginning and I
> feel like I should introduce myself. I live in Southeastern MA with
> my husband and my 2.5 yr old dd.

Do you know about the NewEnglandUnschooling list? :-)

It's not overly busy but it's a great way to connect to other unschoolers in
the area :-)



Joyce

messages.subject: Intro....
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there!! My name is Kim.  I ve been lurking here since the beginning and I feel like I should introduce myself.  I live in Southeastern MA with my husband
messages.messageBody:
Hi there!!

My name is Kim. I've been lurking here since the beginning and I
feel like I should introduce myself. I live in Southeastern MA with
my husband and my 2.5 yr old dd.

We undoubtedly plan to unschool and this board has been a wonderful
help! We're working on deschooling ourselves which is a tough job.

It just amazes me at how completely different the world seems the
more and more I read about unschooling. Sometimes I start to feel
like I'm in the Twilight Zone. So much that I've been conditioned
to believe is so was just wrong. It's pretty scary sometimes to
feel like you're alone in your thoughts.

Looking into this has also brought us to the idea of unjobbing as
well. Now if I could only figure out how to make that work too.
The consumer in me is having a hard time with that!! LOL!!

We are going to conference this weekend!!! So, hopefully we'll meet
some of you there!!

Kim
